result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jesse J Fairley

records.addlTxt: Status conference on December 2, 2022 at 08:00 am.

(Cases 22CF465, 22CF524, 22CF712, 22CF967, 22CF1137, 22CF1138, 22CM288 are called at 11:07 AM) Defendant Jesse J Fairley in court with Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard. District Attorney Peter Rindal appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense waives reading of the complaints in 22CF1137, 22CF1138. Defendant waives right to a preliminary hearing and Court accepts waiver in 22CF1137, 22CF1138. 
Status Conference in 22CF465, 22CF524, 22CF712, 22CF967, 22CM288 and Arraignment in 22CF1137, 22CF1138: 12/02/2022 at 8:00 AM. (If no agreement- parties may be by Zoom)
Status conference on October 18, 2022 at 11:00 am.

9:35 AM cases 22CF465, 22CF524, 22CF712, 22CF967, 22CM288 called. Prosecuting Attorney Afton Brianna Lewis in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jesse J Fairley in court.  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard appeared by video for Jesse J Fairley. Return on warrant. Warrant quashed. Defendant waives reading of Information and enters Not Guilty pleas in all cases. Court receives the pleas. Defendant updates phone number with the court. 

Branch 1 for further scheduling.

9:49 AM cases 22CM288, 22CF967,22CF465, 22CF524, 22CT712 called. Prosecuting Attorney Monica A Fallon in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jesse J Fairley not in court.  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard in court for Jesse J Fairley. Attorney Rivard has no information for the Court as to the Defendant's non-appearance. State requests warrant.

Warrant ordered.

Conditions: 
No contact with anyone involved in illegal drug activities, except in a therapeutic setting. 
Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety. 
Comply with Pre-Trial Monitoring Services with possible testing based on monitoring level.

Case called at 11:33 AM.
Defendant Jesse J Fairley appeared by video, in custody from the jail with Attorney Katherine Cook.  Prosecuting Attorney Tiffany M. Winter in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant waives reading of Complaint. Time limits for preliminary hearing waived. 
Settlement Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on 9/14/22 at 2:00 PM.
RTN: 10/4/22 at 9:30 AM.

Conditions: 
No contact with anyone involved in illegal drug activities, except in a therapeutic setting. 
Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety. 
Comply with Pre-Trial Monitoring Services with possible testing based on monitoring level.
